urls.description: How early do I need to come to the airport for check-in? A. Kuala Lumpur International Airport and International airports Please note that check-in counters close 60 minutes before departure for domestic and international flights. You are encouraged to check-in via web or mobile check-in and come as early as 3 - 4 hours before departure for baggage drop. Please note that check-in counters close 60 minutes before departure. urls.title: What is the minimum connecting time?
urls.description: What is the minimum connecting time? Minimum connecting time varies from one airport to another. The minimum connecting time for KLIA and our domestic stations is 60 minutes. However, it is advisable to allocate extra time for unexpected delays or any other unforeseen events Can't find the answer you are looking for? Ask us through one of the channels

data.text: @hazhmh Hi, @hazhmh. Kindly be informed that the minimum connecting time for Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) is 60 minutes. Therefore, you will have sufficient time to board your next flight. For more information, you may refer to this link: https://t.co/B4oHZMAaMz. -NB
